Looks nice. Feels nice. Fits nice. But one pass through a tumbling washer and the threads are coming out on the seams. It practically is falling apart now after just one wash with a delicate method of washing. Buy if you have skill in sewing. Avoid if you aren’t much of a DIY person.
As someone who only wears skinny jeans, these pants were a huge step in the right direction. Absolutely comfortable, they look dope, what more could you want?

I am 5'3 125lbs bought size Medium. Pants fit well. The straps are so cool. The fabric is that polyester kind of slinky, sorta shiny in some light kind of fabric. It's a gift for my kid who is 5'1 and I think this will fit fine. Kid is gonna love it.
